title.rendered: The best mobile phones for business purposes in 2018

content.rendered:
In the modern day 90% of people that are working age rely on a mobile phone for work. Its gives us quick and easy access to emails, spreadsheets and shared documents that are often vital for a business person on the move.

It wasn’t so long ago that the work phone was the ugly embarrassing second phone given to us by our company. Those days are now long gone with smartphone designs and capabilities all catching us with technology and apps. Most companies are now more relaxed about how you use your mobile phone for small personal reasons whilst they pay for your business contract.

Business mobile phones need to be quick, have enough memory to be able to read shared documents and spreadsheets. Most importantly it needs to be coupled with a strong data plan of at least 10GB or above.

Below, we have listed our best mobile phones deals for business purposes.

Samsung Galaxy Note 8 – This mobile phone is made for business.

The Note 8 was developed for the professional audience. Its for the person who wants a bigger screen which makes it perfect for business use when viewing documents on the move.

With a huge 6.3-inch AMOLED screen and 2960 x 1440 pixels its perfect for the balance between business and life.

The audio quality is on par with the S8 and S8 plus which makes is a good choice for business video conferences.

The addition of the S Pen is another bonus for business use, its makes using Excel on the move simple and quick.

You can buy our best note 8 deals for business use here

Sony Xperia XZ2

The XZ2 is a newcomer to the market. It’s been well received for business use due to the high-quality display and camera. Its great for conference calls and taking pictures and moves for business purposes.

The sound is perfect and paired with a pair of wireless headphones this phone easily beats leading phones like the iPhone X and S9 plus.

You can check out our best XZ2 deals here

Huawei P20 Pro

The P20 Pro is Huawei’s top of the range handset is the best release of 2018 so far. With an incredible Tripe front camera with 40MP it’s a photographer’s dream. For business use it excels due to the powerful processor and 6MB of RAM which makes using spreadsheets and documents on the move quick and efficient.

Prices a long way below the iPhone X and S9 Plus it’s a no brainer for business purposes.
Check out our Huawei P20 Pro deals here

Apple iPhone 8 Plus

The iPhone 8 Plus makes the business list as its drastically dropped in price since the launch of the iPhone X. What makes the 8 Plus a great phone is its quick, have a solid CPU and Processor with a fair size screen at 5.5-inches.

It’s one of the most widely used mobile phones for business but that’s due to it being the oldest phone on this list.

Check out our best iPhone 8 Plus deals here.
